42 namespace Mutation {
43  namespace GasSurfaceInteraction {
44 
51 class SurfacePropertiesAblation : public SurfaceProperties
52 {
53 public:
54  SurfacePropertiesAblation(ARGS args)
55  : SurfaceProperties(args),
56  xml_surf_props(args.s_node_surf_props),
57  m_thermo(args.s_thermo),
58  n_gas_sp(m_thermo.nSpecies()),
59  is_surface_set(false)
60  {
61  assert(xml_surf_props.tag() == "surface_properties");
62 
63  // For all bulk compositions
64  for (XmlElement::const_iterator iter_phase =
65  xml_surf_props.begin();
66  iter_phase != xml_surf_props.end();
67  iter_phase++)
68  {
69  string option = iter_phase->tag();
70 
71  if (option.compare("surface") == 0) {
72  std::string label;
73  iter_phase->getAttribute(
74  "label", label,
75  "Error in surface option for the "
76  "surface properties. A label should be provided for "
77  "this type of surface.");
78 
79  std::string species;
80  iter_phase->getAttribute(
81  "species", species,
82  "Error in surface option for the "
83  "surface properties. Species should be provided for "
84  "this type of surface.");
85  parseAblationSpecies(species, label);
86 
87  is_surface_set = true;
88  } else {
89  throw InvalidInputError("SurfaceProperties", option)
90  << option << "is a wrong input for surface "
91  << "properties.";
92  }
93 
94  n_surf_sp = v_surf_sp.size();
95  }
96 
97  if (!is_surface_set){
98  throw InvalidInputError("SurfaceProperties", xml_surf_props.tag())
99  << "In the surface properties at least one type of surface "
100  << "should be provided.";
101  }
102 
103  }
104 
105 //==============================================================================
109  ~SurfacePropertiesAblation(){ }
110 
111 //==============================================================================
112 
117  int surfaceSpeciesIndex(const std::string& str_sp) const {
118  for (int i_sp = 0; i_sp < n_surf_sp; i_sp++) {
119  if (v_surf_sp[i_sp] == str_sp)
120  return n_gas_sp + i_sp;
121  }
122  return -1;
123  }
124 
125 //==============================================================================
129  int surfaceToGasIndex(const int& i_surf_species) const {
130  return v_surf_to_gas_idx[i_surf_species - n_gas_sp];
131  }
132 
133 //==============================================================================
137  size_t nSurfaceSpecies() const { return n_surf_sp; }
138 
139 //==============================================================================
140 private:
141  void parseAblationSpecies(
142  const std::string& species,
143  const std::string& label)
144  {
145  std::istringstream iss(species);
146  std::vector<std::string> v_species;
147  std::copy(std::istream_iterator<std::string>(iss),
148  std::istream_iterator<std::string>(),
149  std::back_inserter(v_species));
150 
151  for (int i_sp = 0; i_sp < v_species.size(); ++i_sp)
152  {
153  int id_sp = m_thermo.speciesIndex(v_species[i_sp]);
154 
155  if (id_sp == -1) {
156  throw InvalidInputError("SurfaceProperties",
157  v_species[i_sp]) << "Surface species " <<
158  v_species[i_sp] << " is not " <<
159  "a species of the gas mixture!";
160  }
161 
162  v_surf_to_gas_idx.push_back(id_sp);
163  v_surf_sp.push_back(v_species[i_sp] + '-' + label);
164  }
165  }
166 
167 private:
168  const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& m_thermo;
169  const XmlElement& xml_surf_props;
170 
171  const size_t n_gas_sp;
172  int n_surf_sp;
173 
174  bool is_surface_set;
175 
176  std::vector<std::string> v_surf_sp;
177  std::vector<int> v_surf_to_gas_idx;
178 };
179 
180 ObjectProvider<
181  SurfacePropertiesAblation, SurfaceProperties>
182  surface_properties_ablation("ablation");
183 
184  } // namespace GasSurfaceInteraction
185 } // namespace Mutation
